sect1.title: General
sect1.para:
The SW-component DWA implements the application logic of the anti-theft warning system. It determines and controls the state of the anti-theft warning system, evaluates the alarm sources and triggers an DWA-alarm according to the alarm sources. Currently, DWA: - integrates the cyclic_dwa() function from the DWA library - integrates the DWAX functionality by calling the init,cyclic and stop functions (DWAX is an extension of DWA) - sets certain errors for DWA Sensor and DWA Sirene (DTCs) - establishes Sounder LIN communication - integrates connections with Components that are established through RTE.
Note: Components are those components that DWA interacts with, for more details, see the DWA architecture.
